Reviews.Title: “great place”
Reviews.Author: d b
Reviews.Content: A very nice,clean, and friendly place to getaway.Reasonable priced and located nicely. Really enjoy the upper deck to hang out on and just being able to step out from the room to go to the pool or ocean is a pleasure. d

Reviews.Title: “I'm Still Up in the Air Over This One”
Reviews.Author: DisneyF4
Reviews.Content: Occasionally, I find myself in a tough spot when reviewing a place, and this is one of those times. We stayed here six years ago, and the place could not have been more perfect. This most recent stay, however, was not so much. Let me start with what was good. The price for any of the rooms here is very reasonable, especially for being right on the beach. The rooms are a little dated, but they are nice. The pool is great, too- the deep end is 9', and it is always clean. The housekeeper, Irina, is super nice, and really takes pride in her work. Once I looked out onto the balcony and saw her down on her hands and knees scrubbing the neighbor's balcony. She kept our room spotless. We had an ocean front unit, and the view was spectacular. There is ample covered parking, so you won't always have to get into a hot vehicle. The managers were very nice (the actual owners live elsewhere, they told us). Now for the bad... it is NOT QUIET here at night. There were a few other families with little kids like us here, but there were also some older people here (50's and 60's?) that just couldn't seem to maintain any level of respect and civil obedience once the sun went down. We had a guy outside screaming to the top of his lungs one night over and over. Another night, there was an entire gang of older folks sitting outside on the picnic table playing drinking games and being really loud... so loud, in fact, that the police came and asked them to quieten down! These are but a couple of examples of our week here, but there was something going on like this every night that disrupted our family's sleep. We even complained to the management, and they just told us to call the police. So, take my review for what it's worth, and make your own decision. It's cheap to stay here, but, if you're looking for a classier bunch of people (not everyone that was there, just the rowdy ones) to vacation with, you may want to look elsewhere. For us... we probably will not be back here again.

Reviews.Title: “Made to feel like Family!!”
Reviews.Author: Lesley A M
Reviews.Content: Such a great place to stay in Daytona. My parents have been going for the past few years and I joined them Sept 2011 and had such a great time were all going back this Sept too!! Lonnie and her staff are very welcoming and make you feel as though they have known you all your life! The cocktails at 4pm are brilliant too and the Karaoke is also fun!! Mind you that may only happen when our gang is there! Roll on Sept 2012!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best vacation destination!”
Reviews.Author: Socialrunaway
Reviews.Content: We've been staying at the sand castle each year at the same time renewing friendships we've made over the years. It's homey and everyone is friendly. The owners have a weekly cookout for the guests. They bring out the karaoke machine and everyone gets in on the fun. If you want a clean, comfortable place to stay on the beach make your reservations at the Sand Castle!

Reviews.Title: “Great location and great hosts.”
Reviews.Author: gsg1557
Reviews.Content: Feels like our second home every time! Clean and affordable oceanfront motel. Close to everything with lots of choices to have local seafood lunch or dinner, either on the ocean or the river. Dress up or dress down. Even karaoke every so often on the upper deck. You'll love it!

Reviews.Title: “Nice and cozy”
Reviews.Author: awgreenct
Reviews.Content: We stayed the week of the Daytona 500. We had never been and were nervous to have found a local motel at such a reasonable and very affordable rate. There were 4 of us traveling and the room had 2 double beds, a kitchenette, a clean (but dated) bathroom, and plenty of room. This motel is far enough away from the rowdy side of town, but close enough to enjoy the fun. They have a heated pool that over looks the beach and ocean. The people there are very very nice. A lot of snow birds stay here, and they all seemed happy to have us there and welcomed us as we ran into them on the grounds. The only complaint is that they NEED new beds, and they SHOULD upgrade to QUEEN SIZED mattresses. I ASKED FOR A ROLL AWAY, but unfortunately they don't have any. Very easy ride to the track, took 10 minutes. I would recommend this small but quaint motel to singles, family's and RACE FANS.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: wlbskb
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews before choosing this hotel for Race week. I found the location very nice. Close to town but not so close that you have all the traffic. Beautiful beach and great access to it. It was clean, but is a no frills hotel. Just the basics which is all we need. There is no little bottles of shampoo, or coffee for the coffee pot, but there is a 7-ll across the road. They have coffee in the office, but I am a early riser and the office doesnt open early enough. The only complaint I have is that there is no maid service on Sundays, it is their day off. We were not told this so imagine our surprise when we came back from a long day at a rained out race and had no clean towels and our bed was not made. I would stay here again because the people staying here are so friendly and Rob from the office is so nice.

Reviews.Title: “A motel and way more!!!!!....:)”
Reviews.Author: TravelAllDayAnyDay
Reviews.Content: Wow!! What a hotel! This place is at the top of my favorite places to stay away from home.! The staff is great, the views are great, the beach right in front of the hotel is great, the rooms are awesome the list goes on.!. It may seem like all I am doing is saying good stuff about this place but that is because I have no bad to say.!.! If you are looking for a place for a family vacation this is the place you better not pass up.!.!.! :) :) family + fun = The Sand Castle Motel.

Reviews.Title: “perfect place to stay”
Reviews.Author: nat61
Reviews.Content: this is our second visit to this motel, we come over from the united kingdom to stop at this wonderful little motel, its just perfect, we just love the location, and it sits just steps away from the beach, if i was to be critical about it, it could do with a renovation, as there is paint chipping off and things are looking very tired, but it does not put us of staying, the motel is so friendly, and you always meet a great bunch of people, rob on the reception is a diamond, very helpfull, and now we keep in touch with him all year round!! see you again next year

Reviews.Title: “Great little beach motel”
Reviews.Author: ZephyrMarie
Reviews.Content: My husband and I greatly enjoyed our stay at the Sand Castle, which is right on the beach - you're just a few steps away, which we really loved. Depsite how busy everything was, the noise wasn't bad - the walls can be a little thin at times, but we still slept well as most people were not noisy until late hours and weren't up early enough to bother us even though we were right by the pool. The staff was friendly and accomodating and we'd stay again!

Reviews.Title: “My favourite place to be!!”
Reviews.Author: allison1976
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel, location, staff, value for money etc etc.... Steve and Irina (staff) are superb not to mention all the friends we have met over the last four years that we have been coming back there. Right on the beach....it has everything you need. Have room booked again for 2011!!!

Reviews.Title: “A good, friendly beach motel”
Reviews.Author: PKn
Reviews.Content: We have been here 4 times in recent years, the staff are friendly & helpful, quite a bit of refurbishing has been done since our last visit, super pool & adjacent areas, easy access to one of the best beaches there is, plenty of local restaurants, looking forward to our next visit.

Reviews.Title: “You Have To Check It Out!”
Reviews.Author: DaytonaBeach4Ever
Reviews.Content: I have been going to the Sand Castle Motel for 3 years now. In fact, my family and I are making our 4th trip this Saturday. Every time we come down, we are welcomed by the wonderful staff. On our second visit to Sand Castle, a wonderful cleaning woman stopped us as we entered the room and gave us something we had forgotten a year ago! We have so much fun at Sand Castle. We all come down (as a family) with about 7 families total and basically rent out the entire bottom floor. Everything about Daytona Beach Shores is wonderful. I highly recommend that you come and take a visit. I have been to many beaches, (Tybee Island, Miami, etc.) and Daytona Beach Shores is the nicest and most friendliest beach I have ever been too. By the way, I am psyched for my vacation and stay and Sand Castle coming up at the end of this week! Hace a nice stay!

Reviews.Title: “Most FANTISTIC Motel Ever”
Reviews.Author: FrenchZebra99
Reviews.Content: The sandcastle motel is great. They have very clean and large rooms. Thy also have karoke all the time. They also have very friendly staff. Every Thanksgiving they have a by dinner did I metion it was free. I have been coming down here for twenty years. They are pet friendly,under some rules. They do have rules like every place else. They have very friendly people staying every year. I will keep coming until they close. Ps very clean linens

Reviews.Title: “Home Away from Home”
Reviews.Author: cle49203
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have been coming to Daytona Beach for over 20 years staying at various hotels, motels, and condos. We were so thrilled with the"home like" atmosphere. This is a small quaint motel with 30 rooms, with a GORGEOUS sun deck which offers a beautiful view and an all day breeze. This motel is ocean front with a sparkling clean pool. The provide gas grills along with washers and dryers which is a definite bonus when traveling. They are literally a "stones throw away" from Crabby Joes' and the Sun Glow Pier. We would definitely stay again and are telling everyone in Michigan to give them a try.

Reviews.Title: “Loved It!!”
Reviews.Author: fraser001
Reviews.Content: I could not agree more with the previous review - perfectly summed up. Irena the housekeeper was fantastic!

Reviews.Title: “Attitude, Rudeness, and hidden costs”
Reviews.Author: FamilyTravelers24
Reviews.Content: I have never been to a motel with such poor customer service. The manager was rude the entire stay. We were with an extended family for Thanksgiving and they charged us $10 per child per night! Then they could not even give us an accurate itemized bill for the costs they were charging. We had a total of 4 families staying and every family's bill was different. The manager, when I questioned him on the charges, used profanity and was screaming at me. I WILL NEVER STAY HERE AGAIN AND I WILL POST ON EVERY HOTEL REVIEW SITE!

Reviews.Title: “love it ! every year we come back”
Reviews.Author: chaco0
Reviews.Content: Convience is the name of the game, short walk to pool beach and room !

Reviews.Title: “Rude, Rude, Rude and Rude”
Reviews.Author: jsamons
Reviews.Content: Do not stay at this motel. Everyone there is rude. They do not like giving clean linens. They call themselves pet-friendly but are far from that. They're not even people-friendly. We stayed there a few times and hated it -- thinking there were not many choices for pets, but found out there are lots of other motels to choose from. Do not spend your vacation at a dump like this. The parking is awful, noisy, lots of bugs in pool, and roaches in the rooms. Rooms also very crowded -- beds hard. Please look elsewhere. Do not stay at SAND CASTLE MOTEL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent vacation”
Reviews.Author: peter7029
Reviews.Content: The staff are very friendly. The rooms are always clean. We go every year and meet the same people who keep returning. The staff put on a great Thanksgiving dinner.

Reviews.Title: “Cute Little Motel”
Reviews.Author: warmclimatetraveler
Reviews.Content: Ive stayed at this motel about four times now over the past ten years of coming to DB once a year since 1982. Sure, things have changed over the years.....there's a little more rust on the faucets....the floor tiles aren't brand-spanking new.....there's a bug here and there......but for the rates and accomodations for being right on the beach, I have no complaints. They have the usual washer and dryer, a nice pool that isn't always as warm as I'd like, but the rooms all have some type of kitchen facility and are comfortable and clean. There's easy access to the beach, places to eat nearby, they're located right on the bus line and at the quieter end of the strip. I don't expect much in the way of accomodations when I come to Daytona.....it hosts a ton of partiers for many different occasions, after all. It's tired and worn......but the beach is still fantastic and that's the point. (I've also stayed at the Beach Quarters (excellent), Bahama House (excellent), Treasure Island (very nice rooms, clean) Surfside Resorts (excellent) Palm Plaza (nice) LaPLaya (dumpy and dirty) and others at the north end of Daytona near Ormond Beach.) I can honestly say that out of eight or so different places, the only mistake we made was to choose the LaPlaya......but we were 'green' back then! If we go during the high season, we choose an inexpensive little motel, during the low season we can choose luxury. That's what makes Daytona Beach affrodable and comfortable for us without complaints, any time of the year!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We have been going to Daytona Beach for 16 years. They keep tearing down the small motels/hotels. We found the sand Castle a few years ago and love it. Clean, friendly and reasonably priced! Right on the beach!

Reviews.Title: “great place every year”
Reviews.Author: dowopjoe
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Sand Castle two weeks in May. We have stayed there many times, and it is always the best. Great pool, very friendly owners, great bar-b-que area. We can't wait to go back

Reviews.Title: “Good stay, great views”
Reviews.Author: textfast
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Sandcastle for 2 nights in november 2004. Enjoyed our stay from beginning to end! We had room 212, right on the oceanfront, beautiful views, even to Sunglow Pier, where our favourite restaurants for years is: Crabby Joe's!

Reviews.Title: “excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: chrome717
Reviews.Content: Excellent place to stay. We stayed at the Lynn Scott Lee just down the road for many years, and I just love this section of town. Lynn Scott Lee was tore down last year and this is the hotel that the owner recommended. His recomendation was excellent. We already have booked our room there next year.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place to stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I stayed here twice with my Labrador Retriever: It is very dog-friendly and the owners really love dogs. We stayed in the rooms designated for pets and they were clean - the ceramic tile throughout is perfect. I liked being only 4 rooms from the beach so I could check on my dog while I was on the beach. At night, my dog was able to hang out on the patio overlooking the beach. I had a kitchenette and it was newly redone.

Reviews.Title: “Best Vacation Spot in Florida”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This will be our 6th year going to the Sand Castle. My husband & I just love the place. Very friendly atmosphere. Love the owners. Its like our own house. Can't wait until we're there.

Reviews.Title: “We will be back again!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: In May, my husband and I stayed in Daytona Beach for our 15th anniversary. We selected the Sand Castle Motel because it was on the beach and very well priced ($75.00 a night for a JACUZZI room). We were very satisfied! The staff was very friendly. Even though the rooms are older, it was very clean. When our maid found out it was our anniversary, she went across the street to the 7-11 and bought us a bottle of wine. It was very convenient to everything around and right off the exit, no traffic. We are planning to bring the kids back in October and can't wait. I definately recommend this motel if you're on a budget and want to have a very enjoyable stay with a clean room and friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: oceanmist
Reviews.Content: This was our first visit to the Sand Castle Motel and we found it to be very clean & comfortable. There is a oceanfront sundeck on the top floor for all guests to use. The sunglow pier is only a few hotels away making it a very short walk if you want to fish or just have dinner. The rates are good and the owner was warm & friendly. A nice place for the family. We would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Family friendly”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Sand Castle Motel has been a part of our family history for the last 20 years. My parents started taking us to the Sand Castle for spring break or fall break vacations. As we have married and had kids of our own, we too have returned to the motel on the beach. In room kitchenettes, pool, balconies overlooking the beach have made this place a home away from home. Even during biker's week. the lodgers are family friendly. Its a safe, economical place for mom's coming alone to visit their kids at Embry Riddle college, or have some me time. An older mom and pop motel nestled in among the large high rises that gives a feel of how Daytona Beach used to be.

Reviews.Title: “Repeat visitor to Daytona's Sand Castle Motel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We've been staying at the Sand Castle Motel in Daytona Beach Shores for years. It is a family run, conservatively priced motel located right on the beach (great beach), close to the Sun Glow Fishing Pier. Various size rooms (efficiencies available), wonderful pool. Easy access and close to good restaurants. Accommodations are clean and comfortable -- older motel. We've noticed a lot of repeat lodgers there. We are going to stay there again this year (2002).

HotelInfo.Name: Sand Castle Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 3619 S. Atlantic Ave., Daytona Beach, FL 32127
